question: Which state/UT has launched a campaign named 'Red Light On, Gaadi Off'?
explanation:
Delhi government has recently launched the 'Red Light On, Gaadi Off' campaign as part of its 'Yuddh Pradushan Ke Viruddh' (War Against Pollution) initiative to tackle air pollution. Under the initiative, cars will be switched off at red traffic lights to reduce pollution.
As per the recent data from the Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB), air pollution in the national capital remained very poor with its air quality index registered under 'very poor' and ‘severe’ categories.
